metadata.title: CVE-2021-22945 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: When sending data to an MQTT server, libcurl <= 7.73.0 and 7.78.0 could insome circumstances erroneously keep a pointer to an already freed memoryarea and both use that again in a subsequent call to send data and alsofree it *again*.

criterions.comment: curl: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
